text: 3、如果以上都没有解决问题，建议您需要将BIOS更新到1.0.9以后的最新版本，官方的BIOS更新：https://www.dell.com/support/home/cn/zh/cndhs1/dri vers/driversdetails? driverid=899k7&oscode=wt64a&productcode=inspiron-15-5577-gaming-laptop
trans: 3. If none of the above resolves the problem, it is recommended that you should update the BIOS to the latest version after 1.0.9. The official BIOS update site is: https://www.dell.com/support/home/cn/zh/cndhs1/dri vers/driversdetails? driverid=899k7&oscode=wt64a&productcode=inspiron-15-5577-gaming-laptop
